title: Performance Monitoring
description: Monitor Core Web Vitals, bundle performance, and API latency to ensure optimal user experience.

webVitals.title: Core Web Vitals
webVitals.description: Real-time monitoring of Core Web Vitals metrics.

bundle.title: Bundle Optimization
bundle.description: Code splitting and lazy loading for reduced initial bundle size.

api.title: API Performance
api.description: Monitor API response times and caching effectiveness.

do.codeSplitting: Use code splitting for dashboard features
do.lazyLoading: Implement lazy loading for images and components
do.cacheApi: Cache API responses with TanStack Query
do.preloadRoutes: Preload routes on hover for instant navigation
do.monitorVitals: Monitor Core Web Vitals in production
do.serviceWorker: Use service worker for offline support

avoid.eagerLoading: Loading all components eagerly on initial page load
avoid.redundantCalls: Making redundant API calls without caching
avoid.layoutShifts: Causing layout shifts with dynamic content
avoid.blockingRender: Using blocking rendering for non-critical features
avoid.ignoreNetwork: Ignoring network conditions for resource loading
